## Change Summary
What configuration behavior needs to change?

## Reason
Why is this change needed now?

## Variables Affected
| Variable | Change Type (add/modify/remove) | Required? | Default | Example | Sensitive? |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | | | | | |

## Runtime Impact
- [ ] Startup behavior changes
- [ ] Auth/security behavior changes
- [ ] Ingestion behavior changes
- [ ] Ask/retrieval behavior changes
- [ ] Docker/deployment behavior changes

## Rollout Plan
How should this be applied safely across environments?

## Backward Compatibility
- [ ] Backward compatible
- [ ] Breaking change
- If breaking, migration notes:

## Validation Plan
How will we verify the change works?

## Documentation Checklist (Required)
- [ ] `README.md` env var reference will be updated.
- [ ] `README.md` deployment/config instructions will be updated.
- [ ] Sensitive values will be documented with placeholders only (no real secrets).
